reviews.review: игра для дебилов со встроенным казино. одобряю.

i have wasted 230 hours of my life getting called racial slurs and a faggot in csgo public deathmatch lobbies. 10/10 would recommend, i love martin cabello so much.

udpdate: i have a 290 dollar inventory, and now have watched amercian psyucho. this game changes people.

update: 800 hours. i have been through a lot in these past months, but its been good to know this game will always be here to beat me down even further. <3
